snippet.title: Arkantos: Director's Cut Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Download link:
https://mega.nz/file/QohXXQyK#Np1EBXz5qbH3koax9MpSuF1rqPbor6UWDVLF8qiHRns

Discord server:
https://discord.gg/VwzWKN95kT

Welcome to Arkantos' latest update! In this update, we have focused on making this piece of history both playable and enjoyable by old and new LISA fans alike! Among other things, bugs have been fixed and combat has been rebalanced. In addition, you can start right before the Arkantos mod begins so you can hop right into action!

In addition, Pain Mode contains important changes to the story as well as character development as a reward for choosing a more hardcore experience.

Anyways, we hope you enjoy this mod! We have put a lot of effort into making Arkantos into a fresh new experience for dedicated players!
